snippet: From our colleagues over on the Media Decoder blog: Neil Munro of The Daily Caller interrupted the president as he was making his statement from the Rose Garde. "It's not time for questions, sir," Mr. Obama continued. "Not while I'm speaking."
abstract: From our colleagues over on the Media Decoder blog: Neil Munro of The Daily Caller interrupted the president as he was making his statement from the Rose Garde. "It's not time for questions, sir," Mr. Obama continued. "Not while I'm speaking."

headline.main: Reporter Interrupts Obama During Statement on Immigration
